name: practice_ffi
description: **Foundry is a blazing fast, portable and modular toolkit for Ethereum application development written in Rust.**

scripts.build: npm run compile:circuits && npm run setup && npm run js-build && npm run compile
scripts.compile:circuits: mkdir -p build && circom circuits/withdraw.circom --r1cs --wasm -o build && circom circuits/deposit.circom --r1cs --wasm -o build
scripts.info: snarkjs info -r build/withdraw.r1cs && snarkjs info -r build/deposit.r1cs
